dct_title_s: L'Amerique septentrionale: dressée sur les observations de mrs. de L'Academie royale des sciences & quelques autres & sur les memoires les plus recens.
dct_description_sm: Title above margin: America Septentrionalis in suas praecipuas partes divisa, ad usum serenissimi Burgundiae ducis

Relief shown pictorially. Includes decorative cartouche. Shows political boundaries. Shows routes of various explorers. "No. 98" in manuscript in upper right-hand corner. 1 map: hand col.; 43 x 58 cm. on sheet 55 x 64 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
